Package imagingbook.pub.dct

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Dct1d
    Interface specifying all one-dimensional DCT implementations.
    Dct1d.Double  
    Dct1d.Float  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Dct1dDirect
    This class calculates the 1D DFT using tabulated cosine values.
    Dct1dDirect.Double  
    Dct1dDirect.Float  
    Dct1dFast
    Fast implementation of the DCT, based on the JTransforms package by Piotr Wendykier (see https://github.com/wendykierp/JTransforms).
    Dct1dFast.Double  
    Dct1dFast.Float  
    Dct1dSlow
    This class calculates the 1D DFT.
    Dct2d
    This class provides the functionality for calculating the DCT in 2D.
    Dct2d.Float  
    DctMatrixTest
